name: Sprite To Life!
description:
Sprite To Life! is a tool that allows artists to quickly create pseudo-3D sprites from 2D images, or test out sprites created for "sprite-stacking". This is a method used in various successful indie games to create a cute 3D style without requiring the experience and tools to create a fully 3D game.

Current Features:

  • Load in a 2D sprite in profile and extrude it into fake 3D
  • Save this new fake 3D sprite as a pre-rendered "3D" sprite in multiple directions
  • Save this new fake 3D sprite as a series of layers for "sprite-stacking"
  • Load in a 2D sprite strip to test how it looks when stacked
  • Save this stacked image as a pre-rendered "3D" sprite in multiple directions

This is currently a WIP and very basic. Looking forward to building on it and improving it though with help and advice from the community.
